title: Urban Sketches Series
description: A collection of urban sketches capturing the essence of city life. These quick studies focus on architecture, street scenes, and the energy of metropolitan environments.

title: Character Design Portfolio
description: Original character designs for a personal game project. Each character has a detailed backstory and unique visual identity reflecting their personality and role.

title: Nature Studies
description: Botanical and wildlife studies from local parks and hiking trips. These traditional media pieces focus on capturing natural textures and organic forms.

title: TechStart Brand Identity
description: Complete brand identity design for TechStart, a startup incubator. Includes logo, color palette, typography system, and brand guidelines document.

title: Event Poster Collection
description: A series of event posters designed for university tech conferences and hackathons. Each poster balances information hierarchy with eye-catching visuals.

title: Mobile App UI Kit
description: A comprehensive UI kit for mobile applications featuring over 100 components, 50+ screens, and a cohesive design system with dark and light modes.

title: City Lights
description: Night photography series capturing the vibrant city lights and urban atmosphere after dark. Long exposures and careful composition reveal the hidden beauty of the city at night.

title: Mountain Expedition
description: Landscape photography from a week-long mountain expedition. These images showcase the raw beauty of alpine environments, from misty valleys to snow-capped peaks.

title: Street Portraits
description: A collection of candid street portraits captured in various cities. Each photograph tells a unique story about the subject and their environment.

title: Acoustic Sessions Vol. 1
description: A collection of acoustic cover songs recorded in my home studio. Features stripped-down arrangements of popular songs with focus on vocal delivery and emotion.

title: Original Song: 'Digital Dreams'
description: An original composition blending electronic production with acoustic elements. The song explores themes of technology and human connection in the modern age.
